@mdimairo @EdmundKudzayi drug use guidelines require robust evidence of effect- the trials are of poor methodological quality, large uncertain effect -that just isn’t sufficient evidence- it’s not about statistical semantics here-or we harm patients!

@mdimairo Huge uncertainty is not robust enough evidence to make clinical guidelines

@mdimairo @EdmundKudzayi Use of any drugs requires robust positive effect of association and current evidence is there isn’t any- this is the available evidence- which is that there is no evidence that effect exists
